verbs.description: BOSTON ( AP ) - U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren [V: is] putting a hold on President Donald Trump 's pick to head the government 's consumer watchdog agency .
BOSTON ( AP ) - [ARG0: U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren] is [V: putting] [ARG1: a hold] [ARG2: on President Donald Trump 's pick to head the government 's consumer watchdog agency] .
